name: Castle Oblivion (Bad RPGmaker game)
description:
Like many people who have bought a RPG Maker Title. I have dozens of Dead Projects that at most have 2 hours effort put into them, Despite the ideas I might come up with I can never see how it would end  up as, or lack the knowledge of how to make them.

So I decided to force myself to make a crappy game under a time limit to at least say I've finished a project and that's what "Castle Oblivion" is.
Its short, you be lucky if it lasts 10 minutes, No real battles, 2 heavily telegraphed Game overs, something that might pass as comedic dialogue and  a highly disappointing ending

Give it a look if your THAT curious but I don't recommend it for anyone actually looking for a game. Its mostly on here to I can give it to people who ask about it.

Bugs:
Due to the way I used switches, loading a save will make all the events respawn but It should never stop progress
Last boss does not have animations for some reason. I don't care though
